subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Cognate with {{och-l|柄|a handle}}, exopassive of {{och-l|秉|to grasp}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# a [[handful]] of [[crops]]
# to [[grasp]]; to [[hold]]
# to [[preside]] [[over]]
# to [[persist]] in; to [[persevere]]
